paragraphs: Best Doctors, Technicians and Medical Professionals on the planet!
Cancer Cell Shown Above Dividing unto twice as big of a problem.
These Cancer cells divide much faster than healthy cells.
That is because they use sugar (in a process known as fermentation) to feed themselves.
Fermentation only works well in an Acidic, Low Oxygen environment.
Cancer Cells thrive in an Acidic, Low Oxygen environment Healthy cells do not do well in Low Oxygen or an Acidic environment.
Healthy Human Cells do well in an Alkaline, high Oxygen environment.
Cancer Cells will starve in such an Alkaline, High Oxygen environment.
This article will help you understand how to use this information.
Doctor Warburg (photo above) discovered that the inside of all Cancer Cells is Acidic.
Doctor Zolton P. Rona, Md, MSC (Photo Above) in his publication, Early Death Comes from Drinking Distilled Water points out, the most toxic commercial beverages that people consume (i.e.
cola beverages and other soft drinks) are made from distilled water.
It doesnt mater if its sugar or diet.
People who drink water without minerals, spill huge amounts of calcium, magnesium and other trace minerals into the urine.
The more mineral loss, the greater the risk for osteoporosis, coronary artery disease and degenerative diseases associated with premature aging.
Taking mineral supplements wont help you!
The Acidic Water vacuums up the mineral supplements and carries them (through the Urine) and down the drain.

Cancer Cured by Purewater?

Posted on September 9, 2014 by 1800getwater

  Photo of Cancer Cells from Science                                                                        Photo Library.

Cancer Cell Shown Above Dividing unto twice as big of a problem. These Cancer cells divide much faster than healthy cells.   That is because they use sugar (in a process known as fermentation) to feed themselves.  Fermentation only works well in an Acidic,  Low Oxygen environment.  Cancer Cells thrive in an Acidic, Low Oxygen environment  Healthy cells do not do well in Low Oxygen or an Acidic environment.  Healthy Human Cells do well in an Alkaline, high Oxygen environment.  Cancer Cells will starve in such an Alkaline, High Oxygen environment.  This article will help you understand how to use this information.

  Doctor Warburg (Nobel Prize Winner for                                                                discovering cause of all Cancer).

Doctor Warburg (photo above) discovered that the inside of all Cancer Cells is Acidic.    Normal (healthy) Human Cells are Alkaline.

 Doctor Zoltan P. Rona, MD, MSc (Author, “Early Death Comes                           from Drinking Distilled Water).

Doctor Zolton P. Rona, Md, MSC (Photo Above) in his publication, “Early Death Comes from Drinking Distilled Water” points out, “the most toxic commercial beverages that people consume (i.e. cola beverages and other soft drinks) are made from distilled water”.  It doesn’t mater if it’s sugar or diet.  People who drink water without minerals, “spill huge amounts of calcium, magnesium and other trace minerals into the urine”.  The more mineral loss, the greater the risk for osteoporosis, coronary artery disease and degenerative diseases associated with premature aging. Taking mineral supplements won’t help you!  The Acidic Water “vacuums up” the mineral supplements and carries them (through the Urine) and “down the drain”.

  Purewater Systems                                                                                                    1800getwater.com

Purewater Systems,  recommends against drinking water without minerals. Thin Film Reverse Osmosis Systems (like those sold at Costco, Home Depot and Lows) remove most beneficial minerals from source water.  (This makes Water more Acidic).   Only use purified water from Thin Film Systems in Irons, Batteries, and non potable uses. Do not drink it!  Purewater Systems recommends CTA Reverse Osmosis Systems (which leave more beneficial minerals in water) for all drinking, cooking and potable water needs.    Purewater Systems also offers Alkalizers (as post treatment).    This final treatment of water makes the water “Alkalized”.  Purewater won’t cure cancer.  It can replace beneficial minerals (added back to the purified water) to protect your body from Acidic Water (produced by distillers, and Thin Film Reverse Osmosis Systems).  Learn More: 1800getwater.com 

  Ron Lord BSN, MS, LAC,                                                                                         OMD docronlord@gmail.com

Ron Lord BSN, MS, LAC, OMD  (docronlord@gmail.com) recommends Purewater Systems CTA Reverse Osmosis Systems 1800getwater.com with a post treatment Alcalizer for all his cancer patients.  He wants to keep their blood cells and organs Alkaline,  and not Acidic.   He recommends against drinking water from Thin Film Reverse Osmosis and Distillers (which remove most benificial minerals from water and make it more Acidic).   He recommends a PH Balance of 8PH in drinking water.   Learn more about CTA Reverse Osmosis Treatment:  1800getwater.com 

NOTE:  Doctor Warburg (pictured above) discovered that all Cancer is found in parts of the body with “low oxygen levels”.  He suggests Niacin (Vitamin B3) to dilate the small capillaries that carry blood to your skin and organs.   When the small capillaries are dilated,   blood (carrying vital oxygen) can race more freely to skin and organs where it is needed.    He also suggests Vitamin B5, B6, and B12 to “oxygenate” your blood to combat Cancer.    He also suggests there is a “living enzyme” in Live Beets which oxygenates your blood.  You can’t cook the beets, or add vinegar as this kills the enzyme and ends its ability to oxygenate your blood.  You can juice the beets (only the round root part).  This is where the enzyme is found.    Always dilute the beet juice with Purewater from your Purewater System (using an Alcalizer post treatment).   You can add other vegetables and fruit to the juice (along with the Purewater) for more tasty results.  Find CTA Purewater Systems: 1800getwater.com  (look for the $10 coupon).
